The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and small, clustered flowers that are usually pink or white in color. Its fruits are small, capsule-like structures that contain several seeds. This species is often found in lowland rainforests and is adapted to thrive in nutrient-rich, well-drained soils.
